me athara “deliye” nam wu red star kridalolihu da satanata ma sarasi siti heyin, kada damana lada aasana saha pihi da athathiwa prathiwadin wetha kada wadune sagreb ayithi sarbiyawata bawatath tujman marana bawatath wahasi bas dodamin bawa kiyanu labayi.
me aanduwa mulinma prashna karanna gena giye parlimenthu mantha්ri udaya gammanpilawa.
